author: tristan_wilson
content: Can you point to the code for that in geth?

author: tristan_wilson
content: We'd been hoping to mix blob and non blob txs depending on price

author: tristan_wilson
content: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4844#gas-accounting can be determined from excess blob gas in the block header

author: parithosh
content:
Here the geth writeup:
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/26940
```
Cancellation is prohibitive. Evicting an already propagated blob tx is a huge DoS vector. As such, a) replacement (higher-fee) blob txs mustn't invalidate already propagated (future) blob txs (cumulative fee); b) nonce-gapped blob txs are disallowed; c) the presence of blob transactions exclude non-blob transactions.
```
